items.title: this vs that
items.description: A cool collection of articles that point out the difference of similar frontend concepts.

items.title: Super Expressive
items.description: A JavaScript library that allows you to build regular expressions in almost natural language.

items.title: CSS Effects Snippets
items.description: A list of various CSS animation snippets to copy.

items.title: Things I Wish I’d Known About CSS
items.description: A nice article about some useful things to know about CSS.

items.title: The WET Codebase
items.description: A talk by by Dan Abramov about why writing code that is free of duplication leads to software we can’t understand.

items.title: How To Create A GitHub Profile README
items.description: A guide on how to use the recently released feature by GitHub.

items.title: Screeener
items.description: An app to insert a bunch of images to a keynote file, using the mockup you choose.

items.title: 3D Book Image CSS Generator
items.description: Generate an animated 3D image from a book cover and export to HTML/CSS to embed on your website.

items.title: pageoflinks
items.description: The code for a small an simple page of links.

items.title: Fancy-Border-Radius
items.description: A visual generator to build organic looking shapes with the help of the CSS3 border-radius property.

items.title: JavaScript books for programmers
items.description: A bunch of books by Axel Rauschmayer about different aspects of JavaScript.
